attributes.action: Heal damage in BOTH directions to entertainment sector by Brexit end of freedom
attributes.additional_details: Does ask UK government to negotiate with EU easy to obtain visas for performers, talent, personnel required for touring citizens of the UK the ability to perform in all of the European Union.  Creator of petition believes all performers, talent should be allowed regardless of wealth and all genres of entertainment should be considered, a part list would include performing poets, story tellers, musicians, comedians, circus performers, theatre performers, actors and film talent, magicians.
attributes.background:
Develop an easy to obtain visa to allow entertainers and performers to come to the United Kingdom and be paid and should include any additional staff members of their touring group when applicable. 
The scheme should include all genres of entertainment and free of financial scrutiny.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563294
